%_FLOWLOGIC																																
PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
* PBO FLOW LOGIC FOR TABLECONTROL 'RG23D_TAB'																																
   MODULE STATUS_0200.																																
   MODULE GET_CUSTOM_DETAILS_100.																																
   MODULE GET_EXCISE_INVOICE_0200.																																
   MODULE INITAILIZE_VAR_0200.																																
   LOOP AT EXC_TAB																																
     WITH CONTROL EXCISE																																
     CURSOR EXCISE-CURRENT_LINE.																																
      MODULE CHECK_NOOF_LINES_0200.																																
   ENDLOOP.																																
* PBO FLOW LOGIC FOR TABLECONTROL 'RG23D_TAB'																																
  MODULE RG23D_TAB_INIT.																																
  LOOP AT   G_RG23D_TAB_ITAB																																
       INTO G_RG23D_TAB_WA																																
       WITH CONTROL RG23D_TAB																																
       CURSOR RG23D_TAB-CURRENT_LINE.																																
    MODULE RG23D_TAB_MOVE.																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
																																
																																
																																
*																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
* PAI FLOW LOGIC FOR TABLECONTROL 'RG23D_TAB'																																
																																
   MODULE CHECK_DISP_CRITERION_0200.																																
   LOOP AT EXC_TAB.																																
      FIELD EXC_TAB-SEL_OPT MODULE SAVE_MODI_0200 ON REQUEST.																																
   ENDLOOP.																																
   LOOP AT G_RG23D_TAB_ITAB.																																
    FIELD G_RG23D_TAB_WA-FLAG																																
      MODULE RG23D_TAB_MARK ON REQUEST.																																
   ENDLOOP.																																
																																
   MODULE SAVE_MARKED_DETAILS_0200.																																
   module save_marked_details_0300.																																
   MODULE CHECK_MULTI_SELECT_0200.
